title: Microsoft Corp. stock outperforms competitors despite losses on the day
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       slipped 0.29% to $421.65 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around dismal trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.28% to 5,203.58 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.08% to 39,282.33. This was the stock's third consecutive day of losses. Microsoft Corp. closed $9.17 short of its 52-week high ($430.82), which the company achieved on March 21st. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       fell 0.67% to $169.71, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 0.36% to $151.70, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 0.40% to $150.67. Trading volume (16.6 M) remained 6.5 million below its 50-day average volume of 23.1 M.
